name: General Human Skills
description: Core human skills applicable to various career paths

items.name: Focus
items.description: The superpower of pretending the rest of the world doesn't exist for 10 minutes… until you remember you're hungry.

items.name: Intelligence
items.description: The ability to solve problems you didn't create... which is a miracle considering you're constantly creating new ones.

items.name: Communication
items.description: Mastering the art of saying "I'm fine" when your soul is crumbling.

items.name: Creativity
items.description: Pretending new ways to procrastinate that look like actual work.

items.name: Discipline
items.description: The painful skill of doing things you hate because someone, somewhere, told you it's "good for you."

items.name: Charisma
items.description: Making people believe your Google Slides presentation isn't a complete waste of time.

items.name: Patience
items.description: Sitting through mind-numbing conversations, or waiting for your browser to load while silently contemplating your entire existence.

items.name: Adaptability
items.description: Switching from crying in the bathroom to smiling in meetings in under 5 minutes.

items.name: Confidence
items.description: Walking into a room like you own it, even though you're secretly googling how to look "professional."

items.name: Observation
items.description: Noticing everything that's wrong with the world, but too tired to do anything about it.

items.name: Critical Thinking
items.description: Figuring out that the "innovative" project is just a rehash of last year's failed idea.

items.name: Empathy
items.description: Understanding people's feelings, even when you're trying to avoid talking to them.

items.name: Memory
items.description: Remembering all the embarrassing things you've done, but forgetting what you had for lunch yesterday.

items.name: Persuasion
items.description: Convincing someone that your completely unqualified opinion is actually a life-changing revelation.

items.name: Organization
items.description: Filing important documents in the "I'll deal with it later" folder and never looking at them again.

name: Professional Skills
description: Specialized skills related to specific career tracks

items.name: Business Acumen
items.description: Knowing how to make a profit off other people's misery.

items.name: Spatial Awareness
items.description: Not walking into glass doors at the office (again).

items.name: Coding
items.description: Writing code that's so bad, it becomes sentient and starts fixing itself.

items.name: Data Analysis
items.description: Making graphs that prove your point, even if the data doesn't.

items.name: Mathematical Reasoning
items.description: Solving problems that make you question the meaning of life.

items.name: Media Production
items.description: Making cringe-worthy videos of yourself dancing in your room, all in the name of "branding" and "engagement."

items.name: Marketing
items.description: Mastering the art of convincing people they need your product… or maybe it's just good enough to convince them they're really missing out.

items.name: Mystical Knowledge
items.description: Understanding of occult concepts and magical systems... or just knowing which crystals look prettiest on your desk.

items.name: Networking
items.description: Making friends at work by complimenting their new shoes, then hoping they'll help you get that promotion you don't deserve.

items.name: Research
items.description: Spending hours on Reddit and calling it "market analysis."

items.name: Leadership
items.description: The art of telling other people to do what you don't want to do yourself.

items.name: Strategic Thinking
items.description: Planning five steps ahead but still forgetting to buy milk on the way home.
